channel.title: Vaccine Technology on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Vaccine Technology on FinanClub

item.title: AZN
item.description: score:40 Chances: AstraZeneca’s acquisition of Icosavax for $1.1 billion signals its strong interest in expanding its reach into cutting-edge vaccine technology with Icosavax’s innovative vaccine platform. The deal will provide AstraZeneca with a combination shot aimed at two respiratory viruses, which could be a significant opportunity for the company’s infectious disease division.
